item.title: EP 317 - The Choctaw Witch Killer
item.itunes:title: The Choctaw Witch Killer
item.description:
Today we don’t go swimming in a cursed river, and then we try to track down a witch killer!

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
